section.name: Welcome to Teolenn

div.style: float: right; margin: 0 10px 20px 20px; padding: 5px; border: 1px solid #999; background-color: #eee;

section.p: Teolenn is a tool dedicated to 3D distances measurements within the cell developed to access the minimal distance between cellular objects (e.g. individual mRNA molecules and mitochondria surface). Corsen include 3D segmentation algorithm allowing extracting and characterizing cell objects to be processed - surface calculation, aggregates decomposition- for minimal distances calculation. A batch process is implemented to analyse cell populations making possible statistical analysis.
